|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "FriendlyElec NanoPi R5S" and "2204" are on top and bottom of board.
{{See also|NanoPi series|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3568 (Quad-core ARM Cortex-A55) @2.0GHz :NPU Support 0.8T *GPU: Mali-G52 (OpenGL ES3.2, OpenCL 2.0) :VPU (with 4K VP9 and 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Storage: 8GB (eMMC 5.1) Flash, TF card (128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 2GB (LPDDR4X) SDRAM *Network: 1x 1Gbps, 2x 2.5Gbps Ethernet ports *PCIe: M.2 (Key M), PCIe 2.1 x1, support NVME, PCIe WiFi *USB: 2x USB 3.2 ports *GPIO: 12-pin 0.5mm FPC, 2x 8-pin 1.27mm connectors *Power Source: USB (Type-C) support PD, 5V/9V/12V
==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.friendlyelec.com/wiki/index.php/NanoPi_R5S ''NanoPi R5S'' on '''FriendlyARM''' Wiki] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/friendlyelec-unveils-rockchip-based-nanopi-r5s-sbc-with-gigabit-wan-lan-support-and-hdmi-output/ ''FriendlyELEC unveils Rockchip based NanoPi R5S SBC'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/05/30/buy-nanopi-r5s-rockchip-rk3568-mini-router-sbc/ ''NanoPi R5S Rockchip RK3568 mini router launched'' on '''CNX-Software''']
